definition: The habitat type of the site location, such as "seagrass", "coral reef", "oyster reef", "rocky reef", "mangrove"
Temperature, measured with a probe or sonde, in degrees Celsius
Salinity, measured with a probe, sonde, or refractometer, in parts per thousand
Dissolved oxygen measured by a sonde or probe
Person(s) participatating in sampling event. Separate multiple names with a comma
The location where the photograph was captured, either as a latitude and longitude in decimal degrees or as a short text description, e.g. “start of transect 2”
The direction of the camera when the image is captured, in degrees (0-359)
The model or type of camera used to capture the site photograph
Person who captured the site photograph
Any additional notes regarding observations, context, or concerns about the site location
Any additional notes regarding observations, context, or concerns about the transect
